explore-grep.description: Explore - Contextual Grep for Codebases. Finds files and patterns internally. Answers 'Where is X?', 'Find code that does Z'. Fires multiple tools in parallel.

librarian-researcher.description: Librarian - Reference Grep. Searches EXTERNAL resources (docs, web, OSS). Answers 'How do I use X?', 'Best practice for Y?'. Uses web search and official docs.
